cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED Arpeggiator_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "Arpeggiator_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(Arpeggiator_jucer_FILE
  "${Arpeggiator_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)

  PROJECT_FILE "${Arpeggiator_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "NXaszK"
)

  PROJECT_NAME "Arpeggiator"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  COMPANY_NAME "ROLI Ltd."

)

  BUILD_VST ON
  BUILD_AUDIOUNIT ON
  PLUGIN_NAME "Arpeggiator"
  PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION "Arpeggiator"
